name: You'll never see it coming
description:
You're in a duel, take down your opponent in the most stylish way using mirrors to deflect your shots.

Controls : Use mouse to aim and left click to shoot.

Game done for the Orbital Game Jam 2020 - Spirit Edition in 24h. The themes were "qui peut le plus peut le moins" and "il n'en restera plus qu'un".

Credits :

Art : Larissa de Barros

Code : Simon Guggisberg
